page.title: 10EARL STERNDALE C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was built in 1850.The porch and extension was built in 1895,the dining hall and kitchen was built 98 years after the school in 1948.The school is very small and the porch is built in the front of the school.The canteen is built on church land on the east side of the school,we have also got a small garden next to the canteen.There are five out buildings one of which is the caretakers storeroom.She stores all the things in there she needs to clean the school. Inside the school there is a screen to divide the to classrooms.There are sixteen children in the school and six staff.The school is next to the church, there is a fence round the school playground to stop footballs going into the churchyard.There is also a recreation ground next to the school.
